post:
Will this be the most boring ad you have ever read?  It might, the prices are low and the service is better then expected in this price range, so who cares about the ad?

Two different cPanel packages and two different locations available.

The smaller package includes (not limited to):    
1 GB disk   
50 GB bandwidth / month    
Price : $3 / year     
[Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?gid=1)

The larger package includes (not limited to):    
2 GB disk    
75 GB bandwidth  / month    
Price : $5 / year    
[Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?gid=1)


All packages include (not limited to)    
CloudLinux    
Letsencrypt SSL certificate (Amsterdam only, Phoenix (soon))     
Softaculous  One-click installers


Reseller (Phoenix only), SSL Certificates and Hosted Piwik also available.

Thank you for reading.
